name: Send It: The Game
description:
Send It! Ordnance Delivery Services

Keep Calm

And

Send It!

Ever wanted to know what it's like to shoot a mortar? Ever wanted to just destroy stuff? Ever wanted to save Duke's Pond from an imminent Slime invasion? This is your chance

Will you choose to carefully select your targets and take them out with precision, or overwhelm your enemies and flatten them with firepower? Oil depots, radio towers, tanks, high altitude surveillance balloons, destroy them all, fend off the imminent invasion, and save Duke's Pond!

The best mortar firing experience around, guaranteed! Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to... Send It!
